author: mmusich
body:
#### PR description:

Long overdue update to the plotting macros in order to show correctly the sqrt(s) = 13.6 TeV as default for Run-3.

#### PR validation:

Run successfully `scram b runtests_testPVPlotting use-ibeos` and obtained the following (empty on 10 events) plots, which show the update is done correctly.

| PV validation | PV resolution | 
|------|------|
| ![BiasesCanvas_testing](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/5082376/193266626-681a18f2-4a60-4ff4-89a4-6baccdae98b8.png) | ![VertexResolVsSumPt_testing](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/5082376/193266637-ea0d06e6-b51a-4c34-83de-7123604a5313.png) |



#### If this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR. If this PR will be backported please specify to which release cycle the backport is meant for:

Not a backport, but will backport it all the way down to 12.4.X
title: Update to sqrt(s) in the PV alignment validation plotting macros
